CAREER SUMMARY
2018 to date: inmation Software GmbH
Position: Chief Sales and Marketing Officer
inmation is new player in the field of digital transformation. inmation has already global contracts with majors like BASF and Bayer in place enabling seamless global digitalization.
Establish Sales Structure for startup
Investor relationships
Building and manage global partner network – about 10 partners
Lead large corporate pursuits including BASF, Bayer, Boehringer Ingelheim, Suncor, Nestlé

CAREER SUMMARY
2018 to date: inmation Software GmbH
Position: Chief Sales and Marketing Officer
inmation is new player in the field of digital transformation. inmation has already global contracts with majors like BASF and Bayer in place enabling seamless global digitalization.
Establish Sales Structure for startup
Investor relationships
Building and manage global partner network – about 10 partners
Lead large corporate pursuits including BASF, Bayer, Boehringer Ingelheim, Suncor, Nestlé
2016 – 2018 Kellogg, Brown & Root GMBH
Position: Director Business Development Europe and CIS
Build and lead Sales Team in the region
Focus on process license sales in Refining and Chemicals
Develop revamp opportunities in the relevant verticals
Lead grass-root opportunities including design and build of new Solvent DE asphalting in Europe
Economic justification, design and implementation of various revamps for of FCC units
Revamp of ammonia plants
Revamps and build of new acid purification and concentration units
2010 – 2016 Honeywell / Matrikon
Position: Director Strategic Corporate Accounts – Honeywell Process Solutions
Grow global business with key Chemical account, like BASF
Build senior relationships within customer on all relevant levels
Ensure global consistency in commercial terms and delivery model
Share best practices globally
Guide local account managers in line with overall strategy
Lead on Greenfield pursuits in Asia and Americas
Qualify broader Honeywell portfolio to enable further growth
Drive technology enhancements in line with customer/market needs
Establish common procedures and constituent CRM usage
Position: Director Lifecycle Solutions
Responsible for Advanced Solutions Global Lifecycle Solutions, including:
Global Software Support– Benefit Guardianship Program
Aftermarket Sales for
Build Sales Force
Technology upgrades
Consulting services
Enhanced Support Programs
Key strategic Alliances with SAP and Accenture
Sponsor for key global accounts Du Pont, BASF, Bayer, LyondellBasell etc
Position: Director European Operations - Matrikon
Profit/Loss responsibility for European Operations
Honeywell Integration
Sponsor for selected Matrikon/Honeywell Strategic Corporate Accounts.
Corporate licensing and technology deployment programs for BASF, LyondellBasell, DuPont, Shell, Bayer, MOL, etc.
2005 – 2010 Invensys Systems GmbH – Mannheim, Germany
2008 – 2010
Position: General Manager EMEA - Invensys Wonderware Mobility
Initial Objectives prior acquisition by Wonderware:
Build SAT’s EMEA presence
Found Company
Build direct Sales Team and Sales Consulting
Identify and pursue IntelaTrac business with strategic key accounts
Enhance Partner business through EMEA partners
Build Microsoft, SAP, Motorola and Econ partnerships
Objectives following Wonderware acquisition:
Mange Honeywell relationship
IPS/IOM Sales Ramp-up
Project Sponsor for ongoing IntelaTrac implantation in EMEA
Identify and pursue IntelaTrac business with strategic key accounts
Enhance Partner business through EMEA partners
Expand Microsoft, SAP, Motorola and Econ partnerships
2005 – 2008
Position: Vice President Solutions Sales EMEA
Strategic goals:
Build higher margin business in established Invensys hardware dominated accounts by selling
Process Simulation – SimSci
Dynamic Simulation offerings including Operator Trainer Systems
Advanced Process Control and Real Time Optimisation
Manufacturing Execution Systems
Offsites Automation and Blending Solutions
Integrated offerings specific to industries
Consulting Services
Support Invensys’ overall shift from product selling to value proposition based business development
Upsell based on traditional business
Open new and competitive accounts by leveraging unique position
Build annuity revenue streams
Major achievements:
Restructured and expanded EMEA Sales and Consulting organisation
Migrated 4 individual product sales teams in one integrated sales force
Created Business Consulting Group
Implemented Sal

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
